1323930.name: Dino Dungeon
1323930.description:
You and your Dino buddies must work together if you are to find your way home! Switch between Dinos in this 2D physics puzzle platformer. Run, Jump and Kick your way through the dungeons, stepping on each other to freedom!

FEATURES:
  • Unlockable Dinos!
  • Simple compelling gameplay
  • Original soundtrack
  • Full controller support
  • Pixel art aesthetic
  • 2D Physics!
  • Play with one hand

HOW TO PLAY:
  • A+D or ğŸ¡„ + ğŸ¡† to move
  • J or SPACE to Jump
  • K to Kick (or E)
  • L to Loop through characters
  • 1, 2, 3 and 4 to switch between Green, Red, Yellow and Blue Dinos respectively.
